import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete inventory actions by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes inventory actions matching the specified query filter.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Use with caution - this affects all actions matching the filter criteria.

**Workflow**:
1. Build a query filter to identify target actions (e.g., by `InventoryItemId` or `InventoryId`)
2. Optionally preview matching records using [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-actions)
3. Submit the delete request with the same filter criteria

**Caution**: This is a bulk delete operation. Verify your filter criteria carefully before executing to avoid unintended data loss.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Query filter to identify actions to delete.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for querying inventory actions. Supports filtering by action type, inventory item, location, and entity.","properties":{"ActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions of a specific type."},"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific catalog item."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific inventory stock record."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions at a specific location."},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions related to a specific entity (e.g., ticket)."},"InventoryActionGroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions belonging to a specific group key."},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Paging and sorting controls accepted by inventory queries.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based index of the page to retrieve."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Maximum number of records to return per page."},"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Inventory field to sort on, such as `Name` or `LocationId`."},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Direction to sort results."}},"title":"InventoryPagingOptions"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Generic filter used across inventory search operations.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the facet to filter on, such as `keyword`, `InventoryItemId`, or `LocationId`."},"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of UUIDs to match when filtering facets that accept identifiers.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of raw values used when filtering keyword or text facets.","items":{"type":"string"}},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Single-value fallback used by certain legacy facets."}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"InventoryRequestFilter"},"description":"Array of filters applied to the action query."},"Fields":{"type":"array","description":"Optional projection list for expanding related entities.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"GetInventoryActionsRequest"}}}}}

</RequestSchema>
